txt.en:
'The Orcs have been cutting down trees in the Dimrill Dale, but it does not appear to be just for camp-fires. No, they have cut far too many trees for that. I fear they may be up to something more devious.

'While they are not needed within the depths of Khazad-dûm, Orcs are able to construct great weapons of war, weapons capable of laying siege to village, town, or city. I fear that is where all those trees are going.

'Head to Drû-garmadh, south-east of here, and set flame to the wood-piles you see. Hopefully that will delay them long enough for us to devise a plan to end their destruction once and for all.'

'I saw the smoke from here. That should set them back at least a few days, and hopefully they will venture into the outskirts of Lothlórien to fell trees... the Elves there will quickly dispatch them.'
'Hurry up and get down there. You will not want to have to deal with that wood once it has been turned into a catapult.'
The Orcs at Drû-garmadh have been gathering up supplies of wood with which to build massive siege-weapons.

Wood piles can be found in Drû-garmadh, south-east of Mekhem-bizru.\n\nDagfari, hoping to delay the construction of any siege-weapons, wants you to head to Drû-garmadh and burn the wood-piles in the Orc-camp.
Dagfari is at Mekhem-bizru, north-west of Drû-garmadh.\n\nDagfari will be pleased to know you burned the Orcs' supply of wood.
